item.description:
Our June 13, 2011 meeting is a social gathering open to paid members only.  It will not be held at MIT.  For more information, see www.inventne.com

Our July 11, 2011 meeting will resume at MIT.  The speaker will be Patricia Nolan-Brown, a serial inventor.  Her talk, "Cashing In On Your Aha Moments of Invention", shares how she turned her ideas into marketable best-selling creations. She mixes humor and skill outlining the stages of invention and business development around her 4 US Patents and 1 Patent Pending. She will inspire, motivate, and celebrate anyone on this career path.

Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is at http://whereis.mit.edu/?selection=4&Buildings=go. Street parking is suggested on Ames Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected. For more about the Inventors Association of New England, go to our website at www.inventne.com
item.name: Inventors Association of New England Monthly Meetup
